modName: The Dragonborn Comes by Malukah tavern music replacer
summary: Replaces all the background music in the taverns with "The Dragonborn Comes" by Malukah.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/ArmGnX4.png[/img][/center]

[color=#ff0000][b][size=4]NEW MOD BY POPULAR DEMAND!!![/size][/b][/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17627]Player Home Tavern Music[/url]
_____

This was a mod I had posted some time ago, and I just found out that I accidentally deleted it -- not sure when. So here it is again. Maybe it'll get another few thousand downloads? LOL!

Quite simply, this replaces all the background music in the taverns with "The Dragonborn Comes" by Malukah. I take absolutely no credit for this, all I did was convert the .mp3 of her song to the .xwm format Skyrim uses and place it in the right folders with the right names. To install: Just extract the .zip file and place the data folder in your Skyrim main directory (or use NMM).

To see the song, go [url=http://youtu.be/4z9TdDCWN7g]here[/url].
Find Malukah's Facebook page [url=http://www.facebook.com/malukah7]here[/url].
I do have the artist's permission to use her music in this mod; see it [url=http://i43.servimg.com/u/f43/16/93/29/59/dwm_2011.png]here[/url].

_____

[b]INSTALLATION:[/b]

If you don't use NMM or MO, just download manually, extract the archive with whatever unzipping tool you use (7zip, WinRar, etc.) and copy the enclosed Data folder to your main Skyrim directory (where TESV.exe is located), overwrite the folder, then make sure you activate the mod in the Data Files of your Skyrim Launcher.

_____
